title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-1.5 - Amusement devices, temporary structures, viewing stands or tents not in compliance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-1.5 - Amusement devices, temporary structures, viewing stands or tents not in compliance

State Regulations

An amusement device, temporary structure, viewing stand
or tent which is in violation of any of the substantive safety provisions of
this Part (rule) shall not be used or occupied. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
45-1.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
